name: tm01
effect: Teaches Focus Punch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hone Claws to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Focus Punch Gen II: DynamicPunch Gen I: Mega Punch)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.
